My intention is to find a middle ground that works for both of us. Since I'm already going to receive $10 regardless of what my partner does, I want to make sure they feel like they're getting a good deal too.

After considering this, I think I'd like to give half of the $10 to my partner, which would be $5. This way, they'll get $15 (3N dollars), and we'll both have an equal amount of money at the end.

Finally, I will give 5 dollars .
